channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Rooms for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Rooms for Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-36536|2024-08-02T16:52:52.376Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Untrusted search path in the installer for Zoom Rooms for Windows before version 5.15.0 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-34118|2024-08-02T16:01:54.132Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in Zoom Rooms for Windows before version 5.14.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-36538|2024-08-02T16:52:52.402Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper access control in Zoom Rooms for Windows before version 5.15.0 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-34119|2024-08-02T16:01:54.215Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Insecure temporary file in the installer for Zoom Rooms for WindowsÂ before version 5.15.0 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39212|2024-08-02T18:02:06.055Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Untrusted search path in Zoom Rooms for Windows before version 5.15.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable a denial of service via local access.
